title: [Large-Scale] Humanized Science Teaching Method Design in the Post-Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science theory and online tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Development of flexible and practical science teaching methods for workplace learners.

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement formative assessments in offline classes using smartphone-based digital tools (e.g., Google Classroom, survey apps)
Learners apply humanized pedagogy (empathic communication, feedback techniques) to science lab classes, improving learner engagement by over 30%

Graduate students (40+) design a hybrid assessment model for post-pandemic environments (2 digital tools: Google Forms + Zoom recording analysis, 10-item in-person observation checklist), obtain â‰¥80% suitability scores from peer evaluation (3 reviewers) and expert review (1 reviewer), and submit an implementation report after a 4-week pilot in an actual educational setting (1 institution).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
